An intern reused a prime while generating RSA keys for two messages. Can you recover the original texts from the ciphertext below and its twin? ciphertext1: 122798165101099793513934695339525422963367392316765848698433057155072413485340122572130144769986275373863960881310640592228067248115081452277802785445255302159998583917232282363510603189115696287986752593280458535129198848353198477, ciphertext2: 529935545888572253162295808662991775357591349163546733295156646982055518446966563083415694148261283127442480870950405320098689509860252597661516748358035655368842006415006694097298344041615711738697832033841037093647597112544231816

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=853632517411038864043471269539359922880302482096830261875491572544647856139580796899243357740354039221306268638323157489327910686427056496684631106023357798006243549056848666883611320751449165590669158106049836202482928408527990989, n2=541966294783078929987549424211320748561019141416745757926403448152652552672711452192462108903891838074910884090109944967646448077814204257510372738793034670707293630008336219802030822055623837384769474850022637529515755595037344713, e=534657345780849971748470991370891364875569263691085016540322294563326513403194235830755837432339988485965235009856292372289167702406463797268923708379266343312998519756869143009072621943320126136072802561984322707301647092657537179

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{c8085dmr}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 122798165101099793513934695339525422963367392316765848698433057155072413485340122572130144769986275373863960881310640592228067248115081452277802785445255302159998583917232282363510603189115696287986752593280458535129198848353198477, ciphertext2: 529935545888572253162295808662991775357591349163546733295156646982055518446966563083415694148261283127442480870950405320098689509860252597661516748358035655368842006415006694097298344041615711738697832033841037093647597112544231816
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=853632517411038864043471269539359922880302482096830261875491572544647856139580796899243357740354039221306268638323157489327910686427056496684631106023357798006243549056848666883611320751449165590669158106049836202482928408527990989, n2=541966294783078929987549424211320748561019141416745757926403448152652552672711452192462108903891838074910884090109944967646448077814204257510372738793034670707293630008336219802030822055623837384769474850022637529515755595037344713, e=534657345780849971748470991370891364875569263691085016540322294563326513403194235830755837432339988485965235009856292372289167702406463797268923708379266343312998519756869143009072621943320126136072802561984322707301647092657537179
extra_info: p=35610658050251354065823885574816253462650728033898050435445890644401236653294129235839355877173657274874926778637893, q=23971264900706140956800919894194824134745781822987415541905930869988866008024676422219484379007261922017492944573673, r=22608998608459488930759810436083591827656298231912153421684754197522209733141947562336599493889617655539446277696481, φ(n1)=853632517411038864043471269539359922880302482096830261875491572544647856139580796899243357740354039221306268638323097907404959728932033871879162094945760401496386663590871315062096930648787846785011099265793655283286035988804779424, φ(n2)=541966294783078929987549424211320748561019141416745757926403448152652552672711452192462108903891838074910884090109898387382938912184316696780042460377072268627238730439372629116963310979882670760784918766149740649938198655815074560
